title: Space Tribute
description:
Space Tribute is a shoot'em up game where you have to face old games enemies.
Careful with the boss, it is.... unstable
Each level increases the speed, how far will you go?

title: Captain Callisto
description: The Adventures of Captain Callisto is a short 3D action game.

title: Asteroids
description: Asteroids is a space-themed multidirectional shooter arcade game, control the spaceship to destroy asteroids and flying saucers.

title: Elephant in the Room
description: Small puzzle game created in PICO-8 for Github Game Off 2022. Help the mouse to leave the rooms by getting the elephant to break the door!
developer: Ekaktusz, Zahkros, Bartalomew, Mate Hirsch, Lorinc Fazakas

title: Birdie Bartender
description:
Birdie Bartender is an arcade GameBoy-style time-management game. You manage a Birdie Bar and your job is to serve drinks like beer and wine and help Birdie the bartender earn some money so she can afford a nice vacation. Do a day job as bartender and serve quick to earn more money and make your customers happy.
Music by Scott Semanski.

title: Twistbot
description: You play as a little droid trying to escape a tower. With the ability to switch perspectives after you reach a certain level.
